modmenu.descriptionTranslation.${mod_id}: Beautiful particles for your inventory items!

You need to install §6§lYet Another Config Lib [YACL]§f to open ${mod_name} Configuration Screen

${mod_id}.modmenu.category.general.name: General
${mod_id}.modmenu.group.main_group.name: Main
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.mod_enabled.des: If enabled, you will see particles in your inventory from cursor with an item; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.debug_mode_enab: If enabled, you will some debug info; if disabled, won't.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.maximum_particl: The maximum number of particles that can exists on the screen.
${mod_id}.modmenu.option.particle_deleti: Controls which particles will be removed for spawn new particles if the maximum particle limit has been reached.
